import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import basicImg from '../Assets/basicprofilepicture.jpg' import './signup.css' function validateImg() { const file = e.target.files[0]; if(file.size >= 1048576){ return alert("Max file size is 1mb") }else { setImage } } function Signup() { const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [image, setImage] = useState(null); const [uploadImg, setUploadImg] = useState(false); const [previewImg, setPrevievImg] = useState(null); return (

Create account

Name setName(e.target.value)} value={name}/> Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email}/> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password setPassword(e.target.value)} value={password}/>

Dont't have an account? Signup

) } export default Signup;
